fullsync.longtext: Full Catalogue Sync : this will delete old product , update existing product , add new product for the Bdropy Catalogue.

newsync.longtext: Import New Article only : this will add new product for the Bdropy Catalogue.

olddelete.longtext: Delete old Product : this will delete old product that are not in Bdropy Catalogue but are still in this website.
olddelete.start-buttton-label: Delete Old Product not is Bdropy Catalogue
olddelete.deleteAlltext: To delete all Product From Bdroppy !! Click Below

productupdate.longtext: Update Product : this will update existing product from the website which matches in Bdropy Catalogue.
